title: Phaeleh
text:
Matthew "Matt" Preston (Phaeleh, pronounced Fella) is a multi-instrumentalist, producer and DJ, residing in <a href="Bristol">Bristol</a>, England. The name came from an aesthetic decision, to stand out visually rather than having a specific meaning.
He produces music that could be loosely described as cinematic <a href="electronica">electronica</a>, but his roots are in <a href="dubstep">dubstep</a>, <a href="UK%20garage">garage</a> and <a href="House%20music">house</a>. Phaeleh himself describes his music as "electronic bass music" with a heavy emphasis on melody and emotional content. His main inspirations are <a href="Boards%20of%20Canada">Boards of Canada</a>, <a href="Aphex%20Twin">Aphex Twin</a>, <a href="LTJ%20Bukem">LTJ Bukem</a>, <a href="Global%20Communication">Global Communication</a> and <a href="Brian%20Eno">Brian Eno</a>. His compositions are a fusion of live instrumentation and electronic production.
